sentences.en: All these seem to indicate that molecular mechanisms of vertebrate sex determination and differentiation are diversified.
sentences.cn: 所有这些表明脊椎动物性别决定和分化机制是多样化的.

sentences.en: Because these cells are among the largest in the vertebrate brain, they were the first neurons to be identified.
sentences.cn: 由于这些细胞是脊椎动物大脑中最大的细胞，它们是最早被识别出来的神经元。

sentences.en: Cold - blood vertebrate has formatted multi - cold adaptation artifice in the various habitation environment.
sentences.cn: 冷血脊椎动物在多种多样栖息环境中形成多种耐寒策略.

sentences.en: Dead bodies of vertebrate in the field should not be collected or closely examined.
sentences.cn: 不要太接近脊椎动物的尸体或收集它们作样本。

sentences.en: It is also a major component of vertebrate bones and teeth.
sentences.cn: 这也是脊椎动物,骨头和牙齿主要的组成部分.

sentences.en: Name the vertebrate group to which the Hong Kong newt belongs.
sentences.cn: 名称的脊椎动物集团的香港蝾螈属.

sentences.en: Now at Leicester, his research focuses upon the earliest part of the vertebrate fossil record.
sentences.cn: 现在他在莱斯特大学从事博士后研究,侧重于研究脊椎动物的化石记录的最早一部分.

sentences.en: Objective To study the mechanism of the dislocation of vertebrate.
sentences.cn: 目的掌握颈椎脱位的力学机制.

sentences.en: Quite unexpectedly, vertebrate physiologists and microbial biochemists had found a common ground.
sentences.cn: 出乎意外, 脊椎动物生理学家和微生物生化学家找到了共同阵地.

sentences.en: The spleen of certain vertebrate animals, such as cows or pigs.
sentences.cn: 脾脏某些脊椎动物的脾脏, 如牛或猪的.

sentences.en: The unborn young of a viviparous vertebrate having a basic structural resemblance to the adult animal.
sentences.cn: 胎基本结构与成年动物相似的胎生脊椎动物未出生的幼子.

sentences.en: This part of the vertebrate brain has two divisions, the medulla and the cerebellum.
sentences.cn: 脊椎动物脑子的这一部分可分为两部分:脑髓和小脑.

sentences.en: Zoonoses are defined by the WHO as “Any disease or infection which is naturally transmissible from vertebrate animals to man".
sentences.cn: 世界卫生组织将人畜共患病定义为“任何自然地从脊椎动物传播到人类的疾病或传染病”。
